entries.waypoint_description_1: Mysterious caves filled with spice are rumored to be controlled by the Kobola Crime Syndicate
entries.player_sorry: Not yet. I am still looking.
entries.player_reset: I can't do this anymore. It doesn't involve me.
entries.npc_reset: That's exactly what the Empire said too. If you don't help us, who will?
entries.npc_backtowork_1: If you find any citizens in there, try to help them escape as well. Thank you!
entries.npc_4_1: People from the surrounding cities have been disappearing without a trace. At first we though it was some wild creature, until we found someone who escaped from the mines. They told us how slaves are being forced to mine spice at blaster point!
entries.npc_3_1: That's exactly what the Empire said too. If you don't help us, who will?
entries.npc_2_1: Spectacular! This is where we think the Kobola are hiding out, mining spice. If you find any citizens in there, try to help them escape as well. Thank you!
entries.npc_1_1: You need to help us! The city government has proof that the Kobola crime syndicate has established a presence here on Rori. The Empire has ignored our pleas for help, so we're asking everyone else to help us! Will you help us to rid ourselves of this threat?
